Content.Text:
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
What lovely weather! It's great to take
tea outside on a day like today, isn't
it?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's incredible that the only thing
that's changed about this town is the
number of people.
<PAGE>
The atmosphere here is exactly the same
as it was when I lived here before. It's
been quite a surprise to me!

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yeah... I was surprised too.
<PAGE>
But you were gone... gone for more than
10 years, Michelle... so you must be
even more surprised than me.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yeah... and I was only here for a year
or two, as well.
<PAGE>
I'm so glad that you remembered me,
Yuri!

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Of course... spending time with you was
a lot of fun, Michelle. I remember your
magic well, too.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was still just training back then.
<PAGE>
It's quite hard to get a reaction from
you, Yuri, so it was very good practice!

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What did you do... after leaving town?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
I travelled from town to town.
<PAGE>
After joining the circus I was always
moving, putting on a show, then moving
again.
<PAGE>
I achieved some success as a magician,
but travelling as part of a troupe was
exhausting.
<PAGE>
So I practiced as hard as I can, to be
able to leave the circus and head out on
my own.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Not as bad as you'd think. The shows
were a lot of fun, and I met lots of
different people.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Maybe just to put on shows in other
towns, but I'm really planning on
putting down roots here.
<PAGE>
I've got a friend who I can drink tea
with like this, after all! That's hard
to leave behind.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good... I'm happy to hear that.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I forgot to say.
<PAGE>
Welcome home, Michelle.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh Yuri! Just a little late!
<PAGE>
But... thank you. I'm home to stay!
